pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, March 3, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, March 3, 2017:

Vancouver, British Columbia

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion on opioids with first responders and health care professionals.

Closed to media

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Vancouver Convention Centre
1055 Canada Place
Vancouver, British Columbia

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:00 a.m. and present themselves to Room 201.


11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Q&A at the Young Presidentâ€™s Organization (YPO) EDGE Conference.

Vancouver Convention Centre
1055 Canada Place
Vancouver, British Columbia

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:00 a.m. and present themselves to Room 201.


Note: all times local
